featured.text: One is Rapid Eye Movement (REM) sleep.
Scientists have discovered that dreams happen mainly in REM sleep.
23 people who say they never dream show about 20 percent of REM sleep.

definition.zh_def: 一種計算機科學術語，指的是從記憶體中刪除或忽略某些內容。
definition.en_def: A computer science term referring to the act of removing or disregarding certain content from memory.
definition.example: You can use the 'rem' command to clear unnecessary data from the system.
